lead_paragraph: The church said it would withdraw its priests appointed to help organize elections next month that are at the heart of the country’s upheaval.

headline.print_headline: Church Says It Won’t Back Burundi Vote
headline.main: Burundi’s Catholic Church Withdraws Support for Elections

snippet: The church said it would withdraw its priests appointed to help organize elections next month that are at the heart of the country’s upheaval.
abstract: Roman Catholic Church of Burundi announces that it will withdraw its priests appointed to help organize disputed elections in which Pres Pierre Nkurunziza is running for third term.
